name: Michael Daniel V. Samson
text: Iba-iba din kasi yung format.  If HK was KL or Bangkok, would likely be less of a hassle.  They're just the ones in APAC that are decently audible-able places, since the other four (Auckland, Sydney, Beijing, Shanghai) require visas.  Unless HK requires visa na rin, eh di hard pass.

source_obj.text: Iba-iba din kasi yung format.  If HK was KL or Bangkok, would likely be less of a hassle.  They're just the ones in APAC that are decently audible-able places, since the other four (Auckland, Sydney, Beijing, Shanghai) require visas.  Unless HK requires visa na rin, eh di hard pass.
